title.value: Ideas to work on with your hub members

body.value:
Here is a list of possible topics for the school hub to work on -
What is Labdoo?
Help hub members get familiar with the Labdoo process (S0-S6)
Get familiar with the Labdoo website (eg. Teams, Wiki ...)
Laptop Drive Reuse – Discover idle laptops around you and put them into a better use. Repurpose – An old laptop can have a new story. It can help provide education resources for underprivileged children. Recycle – By properly recycling a laptop, 41 lbs of carbon emission will be preserved from entering the atmosphere. This is equivalent to recycling 270 soda cans.
Spread the awareness among family and friends
Set a goal on the number of laptops to be rescued for the semester
Plan the campaign and design the laptop drive flyer
Technical QA Session
Learn how to build a Labdoo magic box (sanitizing a laptop)
Join Labdoo Monthly QA meetings to learn how to fix a laptop
Exam basic laptop components together (eg. memories, hard drives )
Dootrips
Learn how the laptops get delivered without additional expenses
Find travelling resources among family and friends
Try to match their trip plans with Edoovillages or other Labdoo hubs and help carry a laptop to its next stop
Adopt a project site (Edoovillage)
Identify an organization which needs laptop resources
Help manage and communicate between the edoovillage and others
Be part of the software development team
Help translate the Labdoo website into different languages
Help proof-read the Labdoo website (wikipal)
Join the Software Development Team Wall and help test the Labdoo website, identify and report bugs
Get familiar with Drupal and php
Sign up to Labdoo Github and understand Labdoo framework
Recycling
Watch educational videos together, for example, TED Talks
Organize a field trip to recycling facility, for example, AllGreen Electronics Recycling, Tustin
Organize an e-waste drive
